description.zh-cn: 中国大陆政治及国际关系学者、网络名人、电视人。现任复旦大学中国研究院院长、特聘教授，国家高端智库理事会理事，上海春秋发展战略研究院高级研究员。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist and international relations scholar, internet celebrity, and television personality. He is the Director of the China Institute of Fudan University and a distinguished professor, a council member of the national high-end think tanks, and a senior research fellow at the Shanghai Chunqiu Institute for Development and Strategic Studies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等院校，后更名为北京外国语大学。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Beijing, China, later renamed Beijing Foreign Studies University.

nodes.id: 日内瓦国际问题高等学院

zh-cn: 日内瓦国际问题高等学院
en: Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies

description.zh-cn: 复旦大学下属的研究机构和国家高端智库。
description.en: A research institute and national high-end think tank affiliated with Fudan University.

nodes.id: 上海春秋发展战略研究院

zh-cn: 上海春秋发展战略研究院
en: Shanghai Chunqiu Institute for Development and Strategic Studies

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的民间智库。
description.en: A private think tank located in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 一个将国家合法性归因于其作为一种独特文明的代表，而不是作为一个民族国家代表的政治概念。
description.en: A political concept that attributes a state's legitimacy to its role as a representative of a unique civilization, rather than as a nation-state.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，中华人民共和国改革开放的主要设计师。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Chinese Communist Party and the chief architect of China's reform and opening up.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心，现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The core of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Chinese Communist Party, currently serving as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治学家、政治经济学家、作家，以其著作《历史之终结及最后一人》而闻名。
description.en: American political scientist, political economist, and writer, best known for his book 'The End of History and the Last Man'.

description.zh-cn: 由弗朗西斯·福山提出的一种政治和哲学概念，认为人类社会演化的终点和最理想的政府形式是西方式自由民主制。
description.en: A political and philosophical concept proposed by Francis Fukuyama, arguing that the endpoint of human societal evolution and the ideal form of government is Western-style liberal democracy.

description.zh-cn: 2010年代初期在阿拉伯世界发生的一系列反政府示威、起义和武装叛乱。
description.en: A series of anti-government protests, uprisings, and armed rebellions that spread across much of the Arab world in the early 2010s.

description.zh-cn: 指继2010-2012年“阿拉伯之春”后，阿拉伯联盟国家出现的大规模暴力和不稳定时期。
description.en: Refers to the period of large-scale violence and instability in Arab League countries following the 2010–2012 'Arab Spring'.

description.zh-cn: 2011年在中国多个城市发生的受“阿拉伯之春”影响的短暂亲民主示威活动。
description.en: Brief pro-democracy demonstrations in several Chinese cities in 2011, inspired by the Arab Spring.

nodes.id: 全国哲学社会科学工作座谈会

zh-cn: 全国哲学社会科学工作座谈会

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央总书记习近平主持召开的关于哲学社会科学工作的会议。
description.en: A symposium on philosophy and social sciences work chaired by CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中共新四军老兵，曾任中国科学院上海分院副院长、江苏省南通中学副校长。
description.en: A veteran of the CCP's New Fourth Army, who served as deputy director of the Shanghai Branch of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and vice principal of Jiangsu Nantong Middle School.

death_place.zh-cn: 江苏省南通县杨家港南
death_place.en: South of Yangjiagang, Nantong County, Jiangsu Province

description.zh-cn: 张维为的祖父，于1947年遭国民党还乡团杀害。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei's grandfather, killed by the Kuomintang Homecoming Corps in 1947.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，由支持国民政府的地主和富农等组成的武装组织，对共产党控制区进行反攻倒算。
description.en: Armed groups formed by landlords and rich peasants supporting the Nationalist government during the second Chinese Civil War, conducting counter-attacks and reprisals in areas controlled by the Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部翻译室

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部翻译室
en: Department of Translation and Interpretation, Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责国家重要外事活动和外交文件的笔译、口译工作。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, responsible for translation and interpretation for major state foreign affairs activities and diplomatic documents.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 日内瓦外交与国际关系学院

zh-cn: 日内瓦外交与国际关系学院
en: Geneva School of Diplomacy and International Relations

description.zh-cn: 复旦大学历史学系教授。
description.en: A professor at the Department of History, Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，曾任外交部长、中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 华东师范大学历史系教授，日内瓦国际关系及发展高等学院终身教授。
description.en: A professor at the Department of History, East China Normal University, and a tenured professor at the Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies in Geneva.

description.zh-cn: 英国学者、记者。
description.en: British academic and journalist.

description.zh-cn: 就读于联合国译员培训班。
description.en: Studied at the UN Interpreter Training Program.

relationships.target: 日内瓦国际问题高等学院
中华人民共和国外交部翻译室

description.zh-cn: 在外交部翻译室工作期间，曾为邓小平等国家领导人担任翻译。
description.en: While working at the Department of Translation and Interpretation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he served as an interpreter for state leaders such as Deng Xiaoping.

relationships.target: 上海春秋发展战略研究院

description.zh-cn: 张维为提出中国是一个“文明型国家”的概念。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei proposed the concept that China is a 'civilizational state'.

description.zh-cn: 张维为在英国学者马丁·雅克的基础上，提出了中国是一个“文明型国家”的概念。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei proposed the concept of China as a 'civilizational state' based on the work of British scholar Martin Jacques.

description.zh-cn: 张维为在中共中央政治局第三十次集体学习上，就“加强中国国际传播能力建设”主题进行讲解。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei gave a lecture on 'strengthening China's international communication capabilities' at the 30th collective study session of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.target: 全国哲学社会科学工作座谈会

description.zh-cn: 张维为参加了由习近平主持召开的全国哲学社会科学工作座谈会并发言。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei participated in and spoke at the National Symposium on Philosophy and Social Sciences chaired by Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 张维为与弗朗西斯·福山在上海就“中国模式”进行辩论，反对其提出的“历史终结论”。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei debated with Francis Fukuyama in Shanghai on the 'China model', opposing his 'End of History' thesis.

description.zh-cn: 张维为在与福山的辩论中称“历史终结论”已经终结，并持续批判该理论。
description.en: In his debate with Fukuyama, Zhang Weiwei claimed that the 'End of History thesis' has itself ended, and has continued to criticize the theory.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗西斯·福山是“历史终结论”的提出者。
description.en: Francis Fukuyama is the originator of the 'End of History' thesis.

description.zh-cn: 在与福山的辩论中，张维为预言阿拉伯之春很快会变为阿拉伯之冬。
description.en: In a debate with Fukuyama, Zhang Weiwei predicted that the Arab Spring would soon turn into an Arab Winter.

description.zh-cn: 在与福山的辩论中，张维为对阿拉伯之春持悲观态度，并反对其可能在中国发生的观点。
description.en: In his debate with Fukuyama, Zhang Weiwei expressed pessimism about the Arab Spring and opposed the idea that it could happen in China.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗西斯·福山预言中国也会出现类似阿拉伯之春的革命。
description.en: Francis Fukuyama predicted that a revolution similar to the Arab Spring would also occur in China.

description.zh-cn: 张维为认为类似阿拉伯之春的革命在中国绝无可能发生。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei argued that a revolution similar to the Arab Spring was absolutely impossible in China.

description.zh-cn: 张小圃于1947年在江苏南通遭国民党还乡团杀害。
description.en: Zhang Xiaopu was killed by the Kuomintang Homecoming Corps in Nantong, Jiangsu in 1947.

description.zh-cn: 冯玮公开质疑张维为的学术资质，称其曾任职的日内瓦外交与国际关系学院是“野鸡大学”。
description.en: Feng Wei publicly questioned Zhang Weiwei's academic credentials, calling the Geneva School of Diplomacy and International Relations where he worked a 'diploma mill'.

relationships.target: 日内瓦外交与国际关系学院

description.zh-cn: 冯玮称日内瓦外交与国际关系学院是“典型的私立野鸡学校”。
description.en: Feng Wei claimed the Geneva School of Diplomacy and International Relations is a 'typical private diploma mill'.

relationships.target: 日内瓦外交与国际关系学院

description.zh-cn: 时任中国外交部长的杨洁篪曾于2009年访问日内瓦外交与国际关系学院并做演讲，此举被视为对该学院合法性的支持。
description.en: Then Chinese Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi visited the Geneva School of Diplomacy and International Relations and gave a speech in 2009, an act seen as supporting the institution's legitimacy.

description.zh-cn: 相蓝欣撰文批评张维为对“洋教授”头衔的看法，并认为张所鼓吹的中国模式优越论十分荒谬。
description.en: Xiang Lanxin wrote articles criticizing Zhang Weiwei's views on 'foreign professor' titles and considered Zhang's advocacy for the superiority of the China model to be absurd.
